## isISO8601() function

Determines if the string is an ISO-8601 style string.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function isISO8601(potential: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  potential | string | Potential ISO-8601 string |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

- True if the string is ISO-8601 Date &amp; Time string

## Remarks

This does not cover the entire 8601 spec, just a version that is commonly used by NLUs to communicate date &amp; time. For example, durations (like P1Y2M10D) are not supported.
